name: Ross Dress for Less Senior Discount
fullDescription: Ross Dress for Less offers customers aged 55 and older a 10% discount on in-store purchases every Tuesday. Ask the cashier at checkout.
whatTheyOffer:
- 10% off entire in-store purchase
- Available every Tuesday
- Applies to all merchandise
- Must request discount at checkout
- Ages 55 and older eligible
howToGetIt:
1. Visit any Ross store on Tuesday
2. Inform cashier at checkout that you qualify
3. 10% discount applied to purchase
4. Ages 55 and older eligible
5. Some location variations may apply
keywords: Ross, senior discount, 55+, Tuesday, retail, clothing, discount store, 10% off
